name: 國際企業管理專題研究
comment: 上課教室為校本部誠大樓9樓，或綜合大樓7樓。（請參考本系所網頁公告之課表）
restrict: ◎必須先修過【EAM0046  東亞區域研究】 ◎課程不開放上修
goals: To be familiar with fundamental knowledge on international business management
To be familiar with practical and analytical tools and to incubate fundamental research capabilities
To help students equip with the related professional knowledge and capabilities

To help students equip with positive and enterprising spirits, spontaneous and responsible attitudes, great team spirits, global perspectives as well as to emphasize the development of independent thinking capabilities
To emphasize the importance of ethics and moral values through course design and classroom interactions
syllabus:
(This course will be taught in English.)

This course outline is based on NTNU "16+2 Weeks":   
"16 Weeks" are scheduled as follows.  "+2 Weeks" will be explained in class. Thank you.

\[此堂課為英語授課; 此堂課規劃為 16+2週，謝謝。\]

(Tentative/暫定大綱)

Week 1：Course Introduction & Introduction: What Is International Business (C1)

Week 2：Globalization of Markets and the Internationllization of the Firm (C2)

Week 3：OFF

Week 4：The Cultural Environment of International Business (C3)

Week 5：Political and Legal Systems in National Environments (C6)

Week 6：Government Intervention and Regional Economic Integration (C7)

Week 7：Understanding Emerging Markets  (C8)

Week 8：OFF

Week 9：Midterm Exam \[& Review/Supplement: The International Monetary and Financial Environment (C9)\]

Week 10：Strategy and Organization in the International Firm (C11)

Week 11：Global Market Opportunity Assessment (C12)

Week 12：Exporting and Global Sourcing (C13)

Week 13：Foreign Direct Investment and Collaborative Ventures (C14)

Week 14：Licensing, Franchising, and Other Contractual Strategies (C15)

Week 15：Presentations (and/or Review/Supplement)

Week 16：Course Wrap-Up (and/or Presentations)

Note: "+2 Weeks" will be explained in class. The info above is subject to change without notice or with notice in class and/or via emails. Thank you.

methodologies.note: Lecturing important concepts, theories and practices/ 講述國際企業管理重要概念、理論與實務。
Discussing important subjects/ 討論重要議題。
Problem Solving through Cases/Examples/ 透過個案案例問題解決教學。
Multimedia/ 配合相關議題之多媒體應用。

grading.note: Final Presentation/ 期末上臺報告
Weekly Case Presentation/ 每週個案報告

prerequisite: Prerequisite course: 【EAM0046  East Asian Area Studies】 ◎Unavailable for M.A. program students (M.A. program courses excepted) and B.A. program students.
